sum_bart: Jyothy Labs Limited is a Mumbai-based start-up company. The company is based in Andheri (East) and has offices in Mumbai and Bangalore. It has been granted permission to list on the Bombay Stock Exchange.
sum_peg: Sub: Intimation under Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations)
sum_t5: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations), we wish to inform you that the Company has today i.e. April 11, 2025, received an intimation from Western Railway- Ahmedabad Division (Western Railway) whereby the Company has been informed to hand over its Laundry Service Operations located at Coaching Depot- Kankaria, Ahmedabad, Gujarat by April 30, 2025 as its Build-Own-Operate-Transfer (BOOT)

sum_bart: Jyothy Labs Limited is an Indian company based in Mumbai, India. The company has a branch in Marol, Andheri (East), Mumbai.
sum_peg: We wish to inform you that Jyothy Labs Limited has been identified as a Large Corporate by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) in respect of the Financial Year ended March 31, 2025.
sum_t5: Pursuant to SEBI Operational Circular no. SEBI/HO/DDHS/P/CIR/2021/613 dated August, 10, 2021 (as updated from time to time), we hereby confirm that the Company does not fulfil the criteria as specified in para 1.2 of the Chapter XII of the aforesaid SEBI Operational Circular and therefore the Company shall not be considered as a “Large Corporate” for the Financial Year ended March 31, 2025.
